category.name: ProductView
category.category_description: Preferences affecting the behavior of Product views

preference.name: Vis_PV_BlockingViewToggles
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of view toggles preventing the creation of a Product view. Please refer to the description of the preference "Vis_PV_InvalidConfigWarnLevel" for more details. Valid Values: show_unconfigured_variants show_unconfigured_changes show_unconfigured_assignment fnd0show_uncnf_occ_eff show_suppressed_occurrences fnd0show_gcs_cps
